DOC.brief_summary: This research study FEMALE cigarette smoker want quit smoking . Participants provide brief quit-smoking education begin study receive nicotine patch 10 week , free charge . Participants assign either exercise program general health education program . The exercise health education program take place 14 week , follow-up appointment 3 , 6 , 12 month end 14-week program . There fee part study participant compensate time .
DOC.brief_title: Quit Smoking With Nicotine Patch Exercise/Health Education ( Females Only )
DOC.detailed_description: Participants must complete telephone screen process first . All eligible participant must attend orientation session investigator explain study detail . After session , interested participant complete consent form investigator collect blood pressure , rest heart rate , body mass index ( height/weight ) , carbon monoxide sample confirm eligibility . The investigator explain physician consent process ( eligible interested participant must obtain consent physician clinic see past year confirm safe participate ) .
DOC.criteria: Current smoker Ineligible telephone screen . Each participant 's personal physician/clinic determines unsafe participate .
